data.name: ConfirmRegistrationEmailSubject
data.value: Account activation

data.name: ConfirmRegistrationEmailButtonName
data.value: Confirm registration

data.name: ConfirmRegistrationEmailExplanation
data.value: You have received this email because you have recently registered an account.

data.name: ConfirmRegistrationEmailText
data.value: Confirm your email address by clicking on the button below. This step increases the security of your business by confirming that you are the owner of this email address.

data.name: ConfirmRecoverPasswordEmailSubject
data.value: Password Recovery

data.name: ConfirmRecoverPasswordEmailText
data.value: Confirm the reset of the old password by clicking on the button below. This step will delete your old password and allow you to set a new one.

data.name: ConfirmRecoverPasswordEmailExplanation
data.value: You received this email because you requested to restore your password.

data.name: ConfirmRecoverPasswordEmailButtonName
data.value: Recover password

data.name: ConfirmMailChangeEmailSubject
data.value: Changing the mail

data.name: ConfirmMailChangeEmailText
data.value: Confirm the change of your email address to a new one by clicking on the button below.

data.name: ConfirmMailChangeEmailExplanation
data.value: You received this email because you requested a change of email address.

data.name: ConfirmMailChangeEmailButtonName
data.value: Change your email

data.name: Welcome
data.value: Welcome

data.name: Thanks
data.value: Thank you

data.name: LinkExpires
data.value: The link expires 24 hours after receiving the email.

data.name: PrivacyPolicy
data.value: Privacy policy

data.name: TwoFactorCodeEmailSubject
data.value: Requesting a two-factor authentication code

data.name: TwoFactorCodeEmailText
data.value: Enter the code below into the application to complete two-factor authentication.

data.name: TwoFactorCodeEmailExplanation
data.value: You received this email because you requested a two-factor authentication code.

data.name: CodeExpires
data.value: The code expires 1 minute after generation.
